original_text: Then Jesus' disciples were even more surprised. They said to each other, ‘So perhaps God will not save anyone!’
korean_text: 제자들이 매우 놀라 서로 말하되 그런즉 누가 구원을 얻을 수 있는가 하니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus' disciples were even more surprised
So perhaps God will not save anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 아마 하나님은 아무도 구원하지 않으실 것입니다
